content.body: shu: I just reviewed TLA. Mostly looks good. If you still have stuff paged in at all, can you take a look at https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2408#discussion_r671922954, https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2408#discussion_r671923292, and https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2408#discussion_r671931375 ? Those are my only nontrivial comments.
